# Character.ExtendedGraphemeClusterLiteralType

**Type Alias**

A type that represents an extended grapheme cluster literal.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias ExtendedGraphemeClusterLiteralType = Character
```

## Discussion

Valid types for `ExtendedGraphemeClusterLiteralType` are `Character`, `String`, and `StaticString`.
title: Character.ExtendedGraphemeClusterLiteralType
